title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using correct credentials via Supabase Auth with proper role-based access control.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Submit the login form.
Verify that the user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard according to their role.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails gracefully when invalid username/email or password is used, with appropriate error messages displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email and/or password.
Submit the login form.
Verify that login is rejected and an informative error message is displayed.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users can access only the features and data permitted by their assigned roles according to RBAC and Row Level Security policies.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user.
Verify full system access including user, orders, finances, and admin functions.
Log out and log in as a technician.
Verify access limited to technician's own orders and relevant features; restricted access to admin panels and finance.
Attempt to access restricted API endpoints directly according to roles.
Verify that unauthorized access is blocked.

title: Client Registration with Valid CPF/CNPJ
description: Verify successful registration of a new client when valid CPF or CNPJ is provided and all required fields are completed.

steps.description: Log in as an attendant.
Navigate to new client registration page/form.
Enter valid client information including valid CPF and/or CNPJ.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that the client is successfully created and visible in the client list.

title: Client Registration with Invalid CPF/CNPJ
description: Verify that invalid CPF or CNPJ input is rejected with proper validation error messages during client registration.

steps.description: Log in as an attendant.
Navigate to new client registration form.
Enter client data with invalid CPF or CNPJ.
Submit the form.
Verify that the system shows validation errors and does not create the client.

title: Creation of Service Order with Required Details
description: Verify that service orders can be created by an attendant with valid client and equipment data including multiple status options and priorities.

steps.description: Log in as an attendant.
Navigate to order creation page.
Input valid client, equipment, service details, status, and priority.
Submit the service order creation form.
Verify that the service order is successfully saved and visible in the order list with correct details.

title: Service Order Status Transition Verification
description: Verify valid status transitions for service orders through the lifecycle including created, diagnosis, approval, repair, and delivery statuses.

steps.description: Log in as a technician.
Access an existing service order.
Update status step-by-step through all valid states.
Verify status updates are accepted only for valid transitions and reflected correctly in UI and APIs.
Attempt invalid status transitions.
Verify the system prevents invalid transitions with appropriate error messages.

title: Service Order Approval by Client via Portal
description: Verify that clients can log in to the portal to view their service orders and approve requested services online.

steps.description: Log in as a client through the portal.
Navigate to the orders page and select an order pending approval.
Review order details and approve or reject the service.
Verify the approval status is updated and visible in both client portal and internal system dashboard.

title: Equipment Registration and Warranty Status Validation
description: Verify that Apple equipment (iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch) can be registered with detailed information and warranty status is tracked correctly.

steps.description: Log in as an attendant.
Navigate to the equipment registration page.
Enter all required equipment details, including type, serial number, and warranty information.
Submit the equipment registration form.
Verify equipment is properly stored and warranty status is accurately displayed on equipment detail pages and linked service orders.

title: Inventory Management with Parts Usage and Cost Tracking
description: Verify that parts can be added, updated, and subtracted from inventory stock correctly and associated with service orders with accurate cost tracking.

steps.description: Log in as inventory manager or admin.
Add new parts to inventory with supplier and cost information.
Associate parts usage with specific service orders.
Verify stock levels update accordingly and costs are reflected in financial reports.
Attempt to use parts exceeding available stock.
Verify system prevents stock from going negative and shows warning.

title: Financial Transactions and Report Generation
description: Verify the system records multiple forms of payments and generates accurate financial reports, including profitability and expense tracking.

steps.description: Log in as financial manager.
Record various financial transactions with different payment methods.
Generate financial reports for a given period.
Verify reports reflect correct transactions, income, expenses, and profitability metrics.

title: Dashboard Metrics and Alerts Display
description: Verify that the administrative dashboard loads and displays accurate metrics, graphs, financial highlights and alerts in real-time.

steps.description: Log in as admin, director, or manager.
Verify dashboard shows correct KPIs, charts, alerts and updates on system status and key performance indicators.

title: Automated Email Notifications on Status Changes
description: Verify that the system sends automatic emails to clients and staff notifying them of order status changes and important updates.

steps.description: Log in as technician and update a service order status.
Verify that an email notification is triggered and received by the client and relevant team members.
Simulate email server failure or network issues.
Verify error handling is performed and retry mechanisms are triggered if applicable.

title: Performance under High Load
description: Verify the system can support up to 300% growth in order volume and maintain response time below 2 seconds and uptime above 99.5%.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent usage with increased number of orders and users up to 3x baseline.
Measure average response time for key API calls and UI actions to verify they remain under 2 seconds.
Verify system uptime remains above 99.5% during stress.

title: Mobile Device Functionality and Responsiveness
description: Verify that the application is fully accessible and functional on various mobile devices with responsive UI and correct feature accessibility.

steps.description: Access the application on multiple mobile devices and screen sizes.
Verify the UI renders correctly, navigation is intuitive, and all key features (login, order creation, portal access) work as expected.

title: Security - Data Encryption and Sensitive Data Protection
description: Verify that sensitive data including personal client information and payment details are encrypted and stored securely, and access is properly restricted.

steps.description: Inspect database storage and transmission of sensitive data.
Verify encryption is applied in storage and during communication.
Attempt unauthorized access to sensitive data via API or UI.
Verify access is denied and logged.

title: Report Export Functionality
description: Verify that reports (financial, sales, stock, performance) can be generated and exported correctly in supported formats.

steps.description: Log in as a manager or director.
Navigate to reports section and generate various reports.
Export the reports to available formats such as CSV or PDF.
Verify exported files contain accurate data consistent with displayed reports.

title: Handling of Invalid API Requests and Error Responses
description: Verify that the backend API endpoints handle invalid, malformed or unauthorized requests gracefully with appropriate error responses and status codes.

steps.description: Send requests with invalid data or missing payloads to API endpoints like /api/ordens-servico and /api/clientes.
Verify APIs respond with proper HTTP error codes and descriptive error messages.
Send API requests with insufficient permissions according to user role.
Verify access is denied with 403 Forbidden or similar response.

title: Backup and Recovery Process Verification
description: Verify that the system performs regular backups and that recovery procedures restore the system to a consistent state without data loss.

steps.description: Trigger backup process or simulate scheduled backup.
Simulate data loss or corruption.
Perform restoration from backup.
Verify that data is restored accurately and system operates normally after recovery.

title: User Interface Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify that UI components conform to accessibility standards using Radix UI accessible components and that users with disabilities can navigate and use features.

steps.description: Use screen readers and keyboard navigation to traverse main app flows.
Verify all interactive elements are accessible, labeled properly, and usable without mouse.
